forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High of 57F. Winds from the SSE at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High of 14C. Winds from the SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with a chance of rain in the evening, then partly cloudy with a chance of rain. Low of 45F. Winds from the SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with a chance of rain in the evening, then partly cloudy with a chance of rain. Low of 7C. Winds from the SSW at 5 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with a chance of rain, then rain in the afternoon. High of 54F. Winds less than 5 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with a chance of rain, then rain in the afternoon. High of 12C. Winds less than 5 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain, then a chance of rain after midnight. Low of 41F. Winds less than 5 mph. Chance of rain 90% with rainfall amounts near 0.3 in. possible.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain, then a chance of rain after midnight. Low of 5C. Winds less than 5 km/h. Chance of rain 90% with rainfall amounts near 6.6 mm possible.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High of 45F. Winds from the WNW at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High of 7C. Winds from the WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with a chance of snow and a chance of rain after midnight. Low of 30F. Winds from the WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with a chance of snow and a chance of rain after midnight. Low of -1C. Winds from the WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with a chance of rain, then a chance of snow and rain showers in the afternoon. High of 36F with a windchill as low as 25F. Winds from the NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation 40% .
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with a chance of rain, then a chance of snow and rain showers in the afternoon. High of 2C with a windchill as low as -4C. Winds from the NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precipitation 40% .

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with a chance of snow. Low of 25F. Winds less than 5 mph. Chance of snow 40% with accumulations up to 1 in. possible.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with a chance of snow. Low of -4C. Winds less than 5 km/h. Chance of snow 40% with accumulations up to 2 cm possible.
